<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blue Dragonfly Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1992)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 45</row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Boggards](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=16) brew a potent toxin made from blue dragonflies. Swampseers consume this mixture to awaken their divine powers, but the poison causes debilitating hallucinations in most other creatures.

 **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 30 minutes; **Stage 1** [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) (10 minutes); **Stage 2** dazzled and [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (10 minutes); **Stage 3** frightened 1 and [confused 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blue Dragonfly Poison
